TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Create DirectionOfMainAttack / DirectionOfSupportingAttack with different Courses.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create DirectionOfMainAttack / DirectionOfSupportingAttack (ControlFeature) with different directions (Course) in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates DirectionOfMainAttack / DirectionOfSupportingAttack with different directions. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the ControlFeature message schema area, for instance Ground Picture > Battlespace Geometry. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created DirectionOfMainAttack / DirectionOfSupportingAttacks are displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a ControlFeature DirectionOfMainAttack with eastward direction (Course Element).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the DirectionOfMainAttack correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a ControlFeature DirectionOfMainAttack with westward direction (Course Element).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the DirectionOfMainAttack correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a ControlFeature DirectionOfSupportingAttack with eastward direction (Course Element).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the DirectionOfSupportingAttack correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a ControlFeature DirectionOfSupportingAttack with westward direction (Course Element).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the DirectionOfSupportingAttack correctly.
